survey_response: The flight was smooth and the staff were friendly.
I was very unhappy with the food options on the flight.
The seats were comfortable and clean.
Check-in was fast, and the service was excellent.
The flight was delayed but the crew handled it professionally.
Great in-flight entertainment and comfortable seats.
Cabin crew were polite, but boarding took too long.
Loved the snacks and drinks served during the flight.
